      • sensor

        EV3ColorSensor sensor

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColorSensor

        public ColorSensor(Port port)
        Creates ColorSensor object. This is a wrapper class for EV3ColorSensor.
        Parameters:
        port - SensorPort of EV3ColorSensor device.

    • Method Detail

      • getSensor

        public EV3ColorSensor getSensor()
        Returns the underlying EV3ColorSensor object.
        Returns:
        Sensor object reference.

      • setAmbientMode

        public void setAmbientMode()
        Set color sensor to ambient light level mode.

      • setRedMode

        public void setRedMode()
        Set color sensor to RED light level mode.

      • setColorIdMode

        public void setColorIdMode()
        Set color sensor to color id mode.

      • setRGBMode

        public void setRGBMode()
        Set color sensor to RGB mode.

      • getColorID

        public int getColorID()
        Returns current detected color. Use with Color Id mode.
        Returns:
        Color id. Color ids are in the Color object.

      • getColor

        public Color getColor()
        Returns Color object with current detected color. Use with RGB mode and white light on target. Note that these values are the relative intensity of the reflected light of the primary colors. This is not the actual RGB value that would reproduce the color of the target surface.
        Returns:
        Color object with RGB intensity values of detected color.

      • getAmbient

        public float getAmbient()
        Return ambient light level. Use with Ambient mode. Sensor led should be off.
        Returns:
        Light level as range 0 to 1.

      • getRed

        public float getRed()
        Return Red light level. Use with Red mode. Sensor led should be red.
        Returns:
        Light level as range 0 to 1.

      • close

        public void close()
        Release resources.

      • isFloodLightOn

        public boolean isFloodLightOn()
        Return current status of floodlight led.
        Returns:
        True if on, false if off.

      • setFloodLight

        public void setFloodLight(boolean on)
        Set floodlight led on/off with default color.
        Parameters:
        on - True to turn floodlight on, false to turn off.

      • setFloodLight

        public void setFloodLight(int color)
        Set floodlight default led color.
        Parameters:
        color - Color id value from Color object.

      • colorName

        public static java.lang.String colorName(int color)
        Map color integer to name.
        Parameters:
        color - Color id value.
        Returns:
        String with color name.
